channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:25 Air alarm in Cherkasy district to care for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 22:25 Air alarm in Cherkasy district to care for further reports.#Cherkasy This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
